changelog: Created a website for incident/announcement template customization: https://template.redutzu.com/
Added a feature to change unit names
Added locales for units and NO_CALLSIGN
Added the Citizen ID on the citizen page (QB/QBOX only)
Fixed calls not displaying on the dispatch map
Fixed blips not appearing when an alert is created
Rewrote the dispatch code to prevent crashes
Updated the dispatch UI, making it easier to delete/take alerts, and now shows which unit/officer took the alert
